Package io.nem.symbol.sdk.api

Interface RepositoryFactory

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.io.Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RepositoryFactoryBase, RepositoryFactoryOkHttpImpl, RepositoryFactoryVertxImpl
    public interface RepositoryFactory
extends java.io.Closeable
    A repository factory allows clients to create repositories to access NEM Server without knowing the underline implementation.

      • getNetworkType

        io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkType> getNetworkType()
        Returns:
        the network type of the network. It uses the user configured network type if provided, if not, the value will be resolved from the server. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time if necessary.
        See Also:
        RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getGenerationHash

        io.reactivex.Observable<java.lang.String> getGenerationHash()
        Returns:
        the generation hash used to sign transactions. It uses the user configured generation hash if provided, if not, the value will be resolved from the server. Value retrieved from the node/info endpoint. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time.
        See Also:
        RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getNetworkCurrency

        io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkCurrency> getNetworkCurrency()
        Returns:
        the configured network currency configuration like "cat.harvest", "nem.xem " and "symbol.xym". This method uses the user configured properties if provided. If it's not provided, it resolves the configuration by querying block 1 transactions. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time.
        See Also:
        NetworkCurrencyService, RepositoryFactoryConfiguration

      • getHarvestCurrency

        io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkCurrency> getHarvestCurrency()
        Returns:
        the configured harvest currency configuration like "cat.harvest". This method uses the user configured properties if provided. If it's not provided, it resolves the configuration by querying block 1 transactions. This method is cached, the server is only called the first time. The network currency configuration
        See Also:
        NetworkCurrencyService, RepositoryFactoryConfiguration
